https://tmrev.io/movie/252575-Desperate Escape 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/qNDNBrlHAKekBbT59WN1nQLadS6.jpg After having suffered serious head trauma, Brooke tries to regain her normal life despite having lost all memory. Her wealthy fiancé helps her back to recovery in their beautiful country home. Little by little, as her memory comes back, she realizes that her fiancé is not who he says he is. The fortune is hers. Desperate Escape
